documentType: Bureau of Prisons inmate financial/contact report
summary: A Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW Inmate Center Report for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg #76318054), dated May 11, 2020, detailing money received via Western Union in July-August 2019 while he was incarcerated. The report shows three incoming money transfers but no other contact, communication, or visitation information.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received at least $700 via Western Union money transfers while incarcerated in July-August 2019.
The report shows three specific transactions: $200 on July 8, $300 on July 31, and $200 on August 7, 2019.
The report indicates 'No information was found' for contact lists, addresses, phone lists, calls, emails, visitors, and visits, suggesting limited or no recorded external contacts during this period.
The document is a Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW Inmate Center Report generated on May 11, 2020, reviewing activity from mid-2019.
